description: Information about a person who submitted or contributed to a project.
title: contact

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

contact_name.description: Name of any individual who has contributed to this project.
contact_name.example: Format: 'first, middle, last name', middle can be initial or left blank. Example: John,D,Smith.

phone.description: Phone number of the individual or their lab.
phone.example: Enter a valid phone number, including country code.

institution.description: Name of primary institute where the individual works.

laboratory.description: Name of lab or department within the institute where the individual works.

address.description: Street address where the individual works.
address.example: Include street name and number, city, country division, postal code.

corresponding_contributor.description: Whether the individual is a corresponding contributor for this project.
corresponding_contributor.example: Must be either yes or no.

project_role.description: Primary role of the person in the project.

orcid_id.description: The contacts ORCID ID linked to their previous work.
